hu.elte.bfw1p6.poker.server

Class AbstractPokerTableServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • hu.elte.bfw1p6.poker.server.AbstractPokerTableServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Remote
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClassicPokerTableServer, HoldemPokerTableServer

    public abstract class AbstractPokerTableServer
extends UnicastRemoteObject
    A póker játékasztal-szerverek absztrakciója.
    Author:
    feher
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
